chat.seo.title: ChatiZZe - Chat
chat.seo.description: Send one-on-one and group texts, and use international voice and video calls, share you feelings with emoji and wrap your app with colourful themes.

features.security.text: ChatiZZe has a built-in end-to-end encryption which means only you and the person you're communicating with can read them, and nobody in between, not even ChatiZZe.
features.emoji.text: You can share your feelings with a provided list of emojis. Customize your chats, wrap the app with colourful themes.
features.moments.text: Send photos and videos on ChatiZZe instantly. Photos and videos send quickly even if you're on a slow connection.
features.files.text: Send PDFs, documents, spreadsheets, slideshows and more, without the hassle of file sharing apps. You can send files up to 30 MB.
features.gr_chat.text: Keep in touch with the groups of people that matter the most. Group chats have the same features like the private ones, but moreover, you can change the name of your group, mute people, customize notifications, and more.
features.sync.text: With ChatiZZe on the web and desktop, you can seamlessly sync all of your chats to your computer so that you can chat on whatever device is most convenient for you. Download the desktop app or visit chatizze.herokuapp.com to get started.

infoPages.cookies.seo.title: ChatiZZe - Cookie Policy
infoPages.cookies.seo.description: Find more information and read ChatiZZe’s Cookie Policy here.
infoPages.privacy.seo.title: ChatiZZe - Privacy Policy
infoPages.privacy.seo.description: We take Your privacy seriously. We are as honest about what we do with Your personal information as we are about the ingredients that go into the food we serve.
infoPages.terms.seo.title: ChatiZZe - Terms and Conditions
infoPages.terms.seo.description: Find more information and read ChatiZZe’s Terms and Conditions here.

infoPages.faq.question: Do you use nuts in your products?
infoPages.faq.answer: Some of our products, like our nut an pumpkin bars do contain nuts. Additionally, every bakery has only one kitchen, so cross-contact of ingredients is highly possible.

infoPages.faq.question: Do you offer Gluten-Free items?
infoPages.faq.answer: We offer a few 'gluten-friendly' items on our menu, however all of our foods are prepared in a common kitchen so we cannot guarantee that cross-contact with other gluten-containing products will not occur. As a result, we do not recommend our 'gluten-friendly' items for persons with Celiac Disease. Our 'gluten-friendly' offerings are designed for those with minor gluten sensitivities or those who prefer to avoid gluten for nutritional reasons. Our management team and service staff are not trained on the intricacies of celiac disease or gluten intolerance and cannot be expected to provide recommendations or other advice.

infoPages.faq.question: Should I refrigerate my cupcakes?
infoPages.faq.answer: Try to eat Your cupcakes as soon as possible — they’ll taste freshest that way. In the event You can’t eat them all in one day, they keep best in an airtight container at room temperature. Of course, cheesecakes, icebox cakes, and cold pies should be refrigerated!

infoPages.faq.question: Are you hiring?
infoPages.faq.answer: We’re always looking for friendly, hardworking people to join our team. If You’re interested, please contact us through a contact form that You can find on our website

infoPages.faq.question: Do you accept credit cards?
infoPages.faq.answer: Yes! We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

infoPages.faq.question: Do you have a mailing list?
infoPages.faq.answer: We do. To sign up for our e-newsletters, fill in the e-mail address in our subscription pop-up.

infoPages.faq.question: What is your return policy?
infoPages.faq.answer: If You are unhappy with Your order, immediately notify us (when accepting delivery or purchasing in one of our bakeries) of Your concern and return Your dessert to us. We will reimburse You for the cost of the product. You must bring the original receipt of purchase with You.

infoPages.faq.question: What do you use in your products?
infoPages.faq.answer: We use only the freshest, highest-quality ingredients in our baked goods, including real butter, whole eggs, and fresh fruit and nuts. We don’t use preservatives in any of our products.

main.seo.title: ChatiZZe - New Era of Messaging
main.seo.description: New communication app which allows you to securely send FREE messages whenever and wherever you are! Enjoy Flexibility and Simplicity.
main.seo.cardDescription: New communication app which allows you to securely send FREE messages whenever and wherever you are! Enjoy Flexibility and Simplicity.
main.intro.thir: New communication app which allows you to securely send FREE messages whenever and wherever you are!
main.features.sec.descr: You can send one-on-one and group texts, and use international voice and video calls with your friends.
main.features.emj.descr: You can share your feelings with emoji and wrap your app with colourful themes.
main.features.channel.descr: Find a channel, subscribe, share posts with friends and enjoy!

tooltip.name: Use only Latin, Cyrillic, hyphens and spaces.
tooltip.email: Use any valid email. Local part mustn't be longer than 63 characters, the domain mustn't be longer than 190 characters.
tooltip.password: Use at least 1 uppercase and 1 lowercase letter, 1 digit and 1 special symbol (%@?№$^). Minimum length - 8 characters, maximum - 30 characters.
tooltip.username: Come up with a name for your account. Do not use offensive language!
